segments.text: Yes . to our first anniversary and many more to come . Cheers !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll drink to that . Thanks for making this a night worth remembering .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's a special day . They say if you survive the first year , the rest is smooth sailing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good to know . Oh , listen ! The band's playing our song .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I requested it . What do you say ? Do you have your dancing shoes on ?
segments.speaker: S2
